titleStmt.title: The doctrines and principles the persecution, imprisonment, banishment, excommunicating of the saints of God, by the priests and magistrates of Scotland, contrary to the doctrine of Christ and the Apostles ...
titleStmt.author: Stockdale, William, d. 1693.
